The virtues and uses of the cordial spirit of saffron
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by R. Everingham at the Seven Stars in Ave-Mary Lane, London : [1680]
Caption title. Publication date from Wing. In two columns. With a list of coffee-houses which serve saffron tonics. Imperfect: torn, cropped at foot with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
